10 NSFW GIFs to Quit Your Job With

Congrats! You’re out of this hellhole.

Katherine Karaus
May 14, 2018

So you’ve decided to quit your job in a huff!

This is a special moment. It’s your day. Whether you’ve been planning your glorious exit for 15 seconds or 15 years, it’s important you don’t waste the moment. Here are 10 context-appropriate GIFs you can use to underscore your dissatisfaction before you disappear forever in high style.

Have fun!

1) For when you ask for a new title because they won’t give you more money, and your boss’s boss’s boss says “I don’t care about titles.”

2) For when 67 people replied all.

3) For when the CEO repeatedly interrupts your Lean In circle to tell you how much he loves women.

4) For when nobody knows how to load the office dishwasher, and you find yourself washing crusty food off strangers’ forks every damn day just so you can eat your Lean Cuisine.

5) For when your new boss who is younger than you outlines your “personality problems” in a quarterly review and you find yourself Googling “Is murder legal when bitches try me?”

6) For when literally every meeting coulda been an email.

7) For when that guy in sales makes another inappropriate sexual comment, and HR seems really sympathetic about it when you tell them but the next day he gets promoted and invites you to his celebratory happy hour where you can be 87% sure you’ll be groped.

8) For when you do the math and you realize that it would be more economical to move back home and default on your student loans.

9) For when you do hours of salary research in order to negotiate your promotion, and the bastards just neg you.

10) For when you walk outside for lunch and you realize that there’s a whole world outside of the office, bright and beautiful and stretching on nearly forever, but you’ll never see it unless you send this GIF to HR immediately.
